devdoc.author: Bertrand Presles

returns._0: BurnAuth The burn policy for the token.

invalidateEmployeeCard(uint256,uint256).details: Saves the end date (in unix timestamp format) in _tokenEndTimes mapping.

isTokenValid(uint256).details: A valid token is a token without end time set

returns._0: True is it's still valid, false otherwise.

params._tokenURI: The token URI. emit EmployeeCardMinted event when card is minted.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns an URI for a given token ID. Revert if the token ID does not exist. May return an empty string.

params.tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to query

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: An SBT for professionnal decentralized identity and proof of experience.

Issued(address,address,uint256,uint8).notice: Emitted when a soulbound token is issued.

burnAuth(uint256).notice: Gets the burn authorization information for this token.

isTokenValid(uint256).notice: Returns if the SBT is still valid.

mint(address,string).notice: Mint a new employee card Consensual SBT token.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Gets the token URI for the passed token id.

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to generate digital ids for your employees that can also be used as proof of their work in your company
